name: Current weather (extended)

author: Rikudou
description: Uses your phone's location to determine the current weather and country and uses them as part of the prompt. Unlike the other weather prompt, this one uses an expanded description of the weather, like "light intensity drizzle rain".

name: Battery cityscape
description: This prompt includes a custom parameter that renders the city in various states (neutral, dystopian, utopian) based on your battery level
prompt: cityscape, ${b_cityscape}
author: Rikudou

customParameters.name: b_cityscape
customParameters.description: This parameter changes the prompt into utopian, neutral on dystopian based on your battery level

dystopian, ruins, horrible, depressing, horror, madness, hellish, red tint
neutral, early 21st century, busy square, sepia tone
utopia, futuristic, happy, vivid colors, public square

name: Battery flower

customParameters.name: b_flower

Fractalius:

Fractalius is a digital art style that uses mathematical algorithms to create intricate, self-replicating patterns reminiscent of fractals. These intricate designs often feature symmetrical, geometric shapes, and are rendered in a range of colors that blend and transition smoothly from one hue to another. The style often incorporates circular elements, spirals, and mandalas
